message:
用之前注意看一下/usr/share/ibus-pinyin/base.lua 文件必须存在。IBus 1.3.7
330个颜文字。
(￣0 ￣)y
(╭￣3￣)╭♡
(ToT)/~~~


$ wget http://git.io/z0xnsQ
$ sudo cp /usr/share/ibus-pinyin/base.lua /usr/share/ibus-pinyin/base.lua_backup
$ sudo patch /usr/share/ibus-pinyin/base.lua z0xnsQ

重启ibus
输入i fj 键。
